name: That Day (Lanky dev)
description:
Expirement 309.  No Name. Went horribly wrong in a research facility. 3 years have passed , your brother never returns. You went to check The research area, You are the only human alive to know where the facility is hidden and how it can be entered. You are Capable and perfect.

Chapter 1 provides a small gameplay, It is made by a single person so it does takes time for me to develop.
Thanks :P

-Chapter 1 is being reworked .comming with chapter 2 With full gameplay and Fixed Bugs. Thanks for your patience :)

System minimum Requirements :

  At Least 4GB ram

Inter core I3

500 MB available space

To run smoothly:

8 GB ram

Intel core I5

2 GB available space
